constraints.name: query_limit
constraints.description: 查询次数限制，最多允许进行 ⌈n/2⌉ 次查询

constraints.name: tree_structure
constraints.description: 输入的边必须形成一棵树（无环且连通）
constraints.formal: G is a tree (acyclic and connected)

constraints.name: distance_query
constraints.description: 每次查询返回从指定节点到所有其他节点的最短路径长度
constraints.formal: d_i = shortest_path_length(r, i) for all i
